This hotel is a really valuable one for its price :) location, food, service, everything is great! Especially the hotel Driver Lala, he is really kind, nice, and really good driver :) I really enjoyed tours to Ankor wat, Tonle sap with him! If you're thinking about tours, I recommend car tours with hime :)

title: μµκ³ β€
content:
Everything was awsome regarding this hotel! This hotel has free pick-up and sending service and facilities are all good. Gym is a bit small and treadmill was out of order but swimming pool, sauna, spa and balcony are really good instead. Room was clean and has a large bath too. 
Above all, all the staff are really friendly, especially Seng Sophorn. She helped us make photocopies of our flight tickets.

Even though I reach to hotel at 8:30 am, I could check-in at 10 am as the hotel staff arrange for me as soon as possible. It is not difficult to communicate, as the staff are able to speak English well. The room is quite big, including balcony. I was also worried about hygiene as the price is quite low, but you don't have to worry about it because the hygiene was OK. The daily room make-up was also good and fast. They provide the pick-up service and offer the sending service if you want. Even though the location is the best, it is not noisy at all. On the other hand, you should visit 'River Cafe' becaus

title: Hotel where you stay at least one night when you visit Phnom Penhβ€
content: I've visited many other hotels in Phnom Penh, but it's a hotel with a very satisfying cost-effectiveness. The Wi-Fi is not slow and the hot water is good, so my son always tells me to go. Breakfast buffet types are normal, but you can apply for rice noodles and fried eggs for free.

content:
this is my 3rd time in phnompenh. but this hotel was really great !
SUPER friendly staff, good swimming pool. Hotel is very well designed as to Cambodia traditional atmosphere. pretty good. 
but i had problem with snatch in front of the hotel. my bag was stolen by pickpockets.
actually this is my mistake. but traveller must be careful ur bag or something.
i hope to visit this hotel my next rayover flight !

content: Room is very small. I booked a river view room, and the view was a small gap between 2 buildings through a windows with bars on it.

hotel_name: ν‘Έλ―Ό νΈν…” λ¦¬λ²„μ‚¬μ΄λ“ (Phuminh Hotel Riverside)
title: Unpleasant experienceβ€
content:
Such an unpleasant experience at this hotel. I booked a room with riverview but end up, the view is blocked by other opposite houses. When I made complaint to the receptionist, they asked me to turn my eye toward the very right corner of the balcony to see a little bit of river, which made me speechless about the so called reiverview. 
Another thing is this hotel is very noisy, I even can't attend my online meeting with partners inside the room due to the noise from the next door building.
Also noted that the swimming pool/bar/breakfast is not available.
Lastly, when I check in, the deposit of USD25 is required, but upon checkout, they refunded to me in KHR. When I asked why KHR because I am leaving Phnom Penh now, the receptionist asked me to change it myself.

content: This motel is well located and the staff were friendly however the air conditioner is not up to the job and badly needs updating. Even with the key card in the slot all day, it still didnt cool the room.

hotel_name: ν‘Έλ―Ό νΈν…” λ¦¬λ²„μ‚¬μ΄λ“ (Phuminh Hotel Riverside)
title: λ¬΄λ‚ν•¨β€
content: I booked this hotel for the use of the pool and breakfast but there was no breakfast and the pool was closed and there was no mention of this when i booked also the tv was unwatchable overall a very disappointing experience from both the hotel and agoda for not mentioning that there was no breakfast and the pool was closed when i booked extras that i paid for

hotel_name: ν‘Έλ―Ό νΈν…” λ¦¬λ²„μ‚¬μ΄λ“ (Phuminh Hotel Riverside)
title: Poor noise isolation!β€
content: The hotel sits at a very good location. Room was clean and staff was friendly. Cons - the rooftop bar was closed at the moment. The noise isolation of rooms was very bad. I can hear people open/close their room door clearly, even the shower sound next to my room! I think this hotel is only suitable for those who stay for few hours after getting drunk in the bar street.

title: Under performing. β€
content:
While covid reeks havoc in the hotel industry itβ€™s still no excuse for very average customer service . 
Yet again another hotel that cancelled its breakfast and bar restaurant due to covid . 
Only problem is they donβ€™t mention that when booking or at the reception. Services paid for and not received yet again. The staff were indifferent like I should know . 
The next door hotel under construction doesnβ€™t make for a quiet atmosphere and only adds to the reason I would give this hotel a wide birth.

hotel_name: RiverTree Villa & Resort
title: Remote location, clean roomβ€
content:
We were satisfied with services in the resort but only its location. It is difficukt to get there if you follow the google map. Just get to the Kampot town and then go to the resort, it is better and saving time even little farther in its distance. 
Able to enjoy free kayaking as well although not long.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Overall good β€
content: Sheets are clean but have marks of cigarettes burning. Airconditioning worked well. No tv in the room. The only downside is when you book through Agoda they tend to put you on 3rd floor which is a hassle π­ to climb.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: All greatβ€
content: Great location (80 meters from bus).  Great food.  Great staff.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: It's ok for 1-2 nightsβ€
content: Very basic room not even a chair in the room. It's ok for 1-2 nights. There are cheaper places with more comfortable rooms. They charge more for rooms with city view but the window only shows a building under construction.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Splurge for the A/C and viewβ€
content: Super helpful staff. Safe space to stay and enjoy Kampot.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Worth the price,staff was friendly and room was big given and facing the river,they gave me a room with view though I book at a cheap rate without view,will book again next time

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Double roomβ€
content:
For 15us can find better room than here.
Sink broken, shower hose leaking, needs little bit of maintenance.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Water not working β€
content: The pipes have a problem with warter and the bathroom was in a bad condition.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Facilities at bad condition β€
content: Water not working well, everything facilities are old and some are broken.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Budget accommodation in great locationβ€
content: Don't eat the seafood dishes. Apart from that it was OK.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Charming simple guesthouse in the riverβ€
content:
Spacious room and simple layout. 
Great little bar/restaurant in the entrance.
On the riverside and in the centre of the town near all things food and drink related.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: great locationβ€
content: Good Morning Kampot is a no-frills hotel, but it has a great location by the river and amidst the cafe/restaurant area, and has a very friendly staff too.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Good service

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: A nice place and affordableβ€
content: I came here around 5 years ago and revisited recently. Helpful staff and very friendly.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Always good value.β€
content: Good cheap hotel , near cafes and restaurants. On the river front. Great staff, rooms are old but clean. We stay here often. Highly recommend.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μ–‘νΈβ€
content:
All the second floor is have very bed smell
We left after 3 hours

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good Accommodation β€
content:
Nice clean budget hotel. Located in the middle of town on river front. Nice staff, hassle free. 
Cons. No kettle in room or TV. And no Elevator.  But it is a budget clean hotel. Will stay again.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Stay in Kampotβ€
content: Very near to the riverfront, also all facilities nearby

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Really bad guesthouseβ€
content: Very bad room, bad cleaness and no chair no wardrobe at room so I cannot hang my clothes. Water drop down from ceiling in bathroom and when I sat on toilet, water dropped on my head. There is no female staff so the environment is really dirty.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great location and nice staffβ€
content: Nice staff, great location (riverside and just 2 min walk from the center)! The rooms are quite basic, just has what you need, nothing more, nothing less. You can rent motorcycles there, and they help out with any information you need. There is a restaurant downstairs as well. I would definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Very good place but no tv no frigβ€
content: Food very good

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Cheap guest house in Kampotβ€
content: Friendly staff but rooms are a bit dirty and the bathroom stinks. There are better places in Kampot for just 3-5 USD more.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Dirty β€
content: There is nothing, only a dirty room with bed,

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: good valueβ€
content: Good location and nice staff

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good value placeβ€
content: Geat location just across from the river and good price.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Solid, Large and Cleanβ€
content:
We've stayed in a lot of dodgy hotels for cheap, but this one was all round great.
We had the city view on the top floor (no elevator), which also had a partial view of the river.
The room was huge and had two opening windows. A big plus for those disliking airconditioning.

Perfect location too.
We were really satisfied with the price and quality of this room.

Although there aren't many mosquitos three floors up, fly screens would be my only suggestion.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: good valueβ€
content: Nice clean place, and good value compared to a lot of nearby places.  No TV, in case that's an issue for you.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great locationβ€
content: The google reviews are more accurate than Agodas. We didnβ€™t spend much time in the room - our was very basic, just bedsheets, soap, and 2 towels. The shower and a/c worked fine. In need of basic maintenance, but for the price, canβ€™t complain. Get their french press coffee & their breakfast are awesome!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Nice staff but needs demolishing dirty walls ,no tv no fridge no safe ,β€
content: Nothing like the agoda advertising, felt burnt on this one

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Ok but no moreβ€
content:
Location is great.
My room is ok. The AC is a real pro.
Hot shower as well.
But I felt it was not super clean.
Staff do the job but not as friendly as all the other places I stayed in Cambodia so far.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Made my vacation betterβ€
content:
The staff is so friendly and helpful. My gf kept some things in the main fridge, which the staff was more than willing to assist in. For the price, the room is great. It was clean. The location is perfect!!!

I extended my stay!  If I go to kampot again, I will absolutely book again!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location, but bad roomsβ€
content: Location is good, but rooms are without window and no ventilation. Staff is rude and overcharge for anything

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Beside the river Hotelβ€
content:
++location at the river and central
---Rooms don't have window and no ventilation.  No shoes allowed inside building.
Male staff is too rude

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Very basic but worksβ€
content: Room are very basic, no cupboards, basic table, WiFi works but well located

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μΆ‹μβ€
content: The place was well located. Next to all the restaurants and the night food market. They offer tour if you want and I think you can rent a scooter if you need to. I don't have anything bad to say but maybe that the room was a bit.. Dirty. The walls were stained. But the shower was actually not too bad and it was warm. So..

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great Spotβ€
content: Stayed only one night. Great place, friendly staff and nice food

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Its not bad, if youβ€™re not paying too much.β€
content: We stayed for a week. For the price we paid, $30/night, we were kind of expecting more (I.e. new sheets, towels toilet paper etc.). They did empty out trash because we left it outside of our room, but if we hadnβ€™t I donβ€™t know if it would have been emptied. We found out later that our rate was probably higher due to a local festival taking place during our stay. If youβ€™re not paying, at most, more than $15 a night and are only staying for a couple nights this place isnβ€™t bad. The ac and WiFi worked well and it was clean and quite, but still donβ€™t expect much in terms of service.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μΆ‹μβ€
content: I was charged more then l was quoted and the curtains didn't fit the window size

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Pretty goodβ€
content: Our room was sweet but looks like the hotel needs attention. Our room was very big but no place to sit other than the bed.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great stay!β€
content:
A large and clean room
Silent
well located
Great value for the price!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Best guesthouse we have stayed at. Staff if very helpful and nice.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Just what Iβ€™m after!β€
content:
Got it for $12 

Good location, nice room, good food great staff.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location and nice priceβ€
content:
Near food, near boat trip, near bars
excellent location

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Homeβ€
content: I fell in love with Kampot and ended up staying here for 2 weeks. My stay here felt like a home away from home. The staff always greeted me as I was coming in or leaving and they were helpful with all my questions. The owner let me store my large backpack at the place when I did an overnight trip to Rabbit Island which was awesome!  When I returned the next day he let me stay in my original room as requested. He also helped me arrange my bus back to Phnom Pehn. The food at the restaurant was tasty.  The location is great - walkable to anywhere in town. They only come to clean your room when asked, but I enjoyed the privacy I got.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good value β€
content: Nice hostel, would definitely stay again (especially since they have tiny kittens!) Offer good value drinks downstairs and good wine.  Friendly staff, comfy bed.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Awesome Value Riversideβ€
content:
booked this place last minute and  extended our stay a bit, would recommend in a heartbeat for traveling on a budget.

roof top bar is great for a romantic sunset. chill vibes. 

100.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Nice locationβ€
content: Good value for money. Located right across from the river and loads of good restaurants within 5 minute walk. Room had good hot water. Faults maybe  - no window, no tv, no fridge, but it didn't bother me as I didn't spend much time in my room. I will come back again.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Cheap, comfy, good viewβ€
content: The staff is sooo friendly. Had a very good stay. Chilled every evening on the balcony with river view.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Second hotel I stayed in kampot. By far the bestβ€
content: All the staff were friendly, located across street from river. Very laidback bar on roof with pool table and great night view of lighted river boats. I loved it. Also good food.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Staff very helpful despite our limitations of language.  They were able to assist us in booking a tour to Honor National Park combined with a sunset river cruise including a stop to see fireflies.  Great location with easy access to market and many restaurants.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great Guest House. β€
content:
If your looking for an affordable guest house, in a great location. With a great roof top bar with awesome sun set views, cold beers and great cocktails. Delicious food and friendly staff. 

Then look no further!

I had a great stay. Thank you!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great hotel along the riverβ€
content: Very happy to have stayed there. Nice staff, nice (maybe because new...) room and working facilities (WiFi, AC, etc.). Funny fact, you have to take away your shoes at the entrance and be without them to your room. But as the ground is almost clean, it's not a problem. For info, we directly booked a room from their to their sister-ghest house in Phnom Phen: same kind of nice people their, close to Street 172. Only a bit older, but clean. THanks "Good Morning"!

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Fantastic β€
content:
We stayed here for 2 nights, then booked here again for another night when we returned to Kampot about a week later because we liked it so much. 

Clean, comfortable, spacious, good a/c and fan in the room. Staff were great, very helpful with everything we needed. Great location right on the river.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Perfect place to rest and recharge β€
content: Right on the water front with plenty of wonderful food all around. The music from the common area is a bit loud but easy enough to tune it out.  The staff are super helpful and kind.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great hotelβ€
content:
Great staff,good fast check in
Very clean basic room,no t.v.
Great location
Good food menu
Will definitely stay again

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Riverside near Old Bridgeβ€
content: This place is good, the manager is just great though. It is clean, reasonable price, has what you need and puts you right in the middle of Kampot - close to everything. Stairs to all the rooms, and to the rooftop bar - as in their promo photo. Just simply, a very good place to stay.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Big clean room, good locationβ€
content: Rooms were big, but bad smell from the bathroom. Still nice and would def come back :)

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Riverside vfmβ€
content: We wanted a place to stay for one night that was central and reasonably priced. You really cant beat this guesthouse. Staff so helpful. Room large if basic. All great and in the perfect spot to experience Kampot.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Excellent value for money - great place to stay! β€
content:
We loved Good Morning Kampot, after staying in some not so clean places without hot water for a while it was a nice change to find a clean, spacious room. 

The staff are very friendly, even the owner of the hotel came to speak to us in the rooftop bar. 

The location is great itβ€™s right on the river front and close to the town centre. You can watch the sunset from the rooftop bar. We were given a voucher for a free beer each but we liked it so much up there we stayed all night. Food wasnβ€™t excellent too. 

The restaurant downstairs is also good and they make a great breakfast burrito with hash brown. I have to say while we were there there was a stand in chef for one day who I think was a better cook than the usual chef! 

Definitely good value for money we couldnβ€™t believe we only paid $10 dollars for a double room. Canβ€™t recommend this place enough! 

Only negative was the bedsheet had some stains on but the gave us a fresh one no problem.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Simple,  clean guest house, great locationβ€
content: Worth noting that some rooms donβ€™t have window. Guest house is clean and basic. Location impeccable on riverfront close to all restaurants and businesses.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good value, great staffβ€
content: The guys at the front desk are super friendly and helpful, and the rooms are a good value if a little cramped. There are a couple tables on the 3rd-floor patio, but otherwise not much common space.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Budget β€
content: Place could do with a paint job.but apart from that,staff was great and tuk tuk driver  was excellent.food was plentiful and nice.overall for money great stay.and close to everything

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great placeβ€
content:
The furnishings are a tad on the spartan side, but very clean. Toilets are exceptional. 

The high point is the kitchen. The menu has quite a few very unusual, very tasty dishes. I had a "vegan breakfast skillet" that was a mixture of peppers, onions, potatoes in a very tasty tomato-based sauce (with lots of tomatoes), topped with a dollop of a delicious red cabbage mixture. Spectacular, and I'm not a vegan! The coffee comes in a Bodum plunger carafe. Quite excellent.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good locationβ€
content:
PROS: Well located on the riverside in the town. Large, clean room with good, hot shower.  
CONS: Only 2 plug sockets in the room, 1 being for the fan.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good place to stayβ€
content: The place is good to stay and staff are helpful. However don't book the bus to Phnom Penh in the hostel as they provided us with a nightmare of a trip. They promised to take everybody to central market as end of destination, instead the driver left us in a place no where close to central market where a thousand tuktuk were waiting to take us to central market for a price. Accomodation is okay but avoid any of their bus/taxi services

content: Only one problem recently they opened the rooftop bar which is a good place to hang out and get a view but they turn the music up and party at night which makes noise through the whole building and is not great for those trying to sleep.it is accommodation not a bar best if they tone it down otherwise food is good rooms are big and all is ok

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Great location . Very good value for money β€
content:
Nothing much more to ask for . Facilities are basic but acceptable ... no tv n no fridge  for the unit I booked . But I never turn on tv anyway . A fridge would be nice . I had both a fan and aircond and that ls enough .and itβ€™s clean. The sheets are a bit thin but you can turn the aircond to less cold !
Location is fantastic, right in front of the river with great morning and sunset views.  A lot of sight seeing boats in front too .
Staff were all helpful and friendly.  Most speak English . 
When I go back to Kampot In future, i will definitely book this place again .

content: We had rented a room with a fan and on Agoda it is cheaper then walk in!! So book here. The room 205 had 2 BIG windows that brought us lots of air. We had hot water. The staff was nice, very nice. They have scooter for 5$ a day and laundry for 1$/ kg. In 3 night they havent clean or change the towel once.  Location is PERFECT.  We havenβ€™t try the restaurant.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Stay away at all cost !β€
content: Arraived and found out my passport was missing. The man in reception found that amusing and refused to let me check in. Also offer no help at all for a man in need. No advice, no offer phone for call, just standing there smiling at the angry person that needed help. Stay away from this place so it  get closed. Hope nobody books here. The passport was not needed for my next place and they helped me with phone and all, totally opposite of the bad people that work at Good Morning Kampot. NOT RECOMENDED !

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Good location, terrible rooms and staff - avoid β€
content:
Good location near the river and lots of restaurants and bars. However, the rooms are absolutely dreadful - I had a room on the third floor which was tiny and had absolutely no furniture apart from a bed and a table, not even a chair. A single power plug and not even a TV. The room was filthy (cigarette buds in the sink) and there was mold everywhere - on the walls, the ceiling, in the bathroom etc. I asked the staff to change the room but they just said β€weβ€™re fullβ€ and didnβ€™t really care. Also, no refund.

To make things worse, every morning the staff would go up to to the rooftop bar to play pool and play loud music. Being woken at 7:00 in the morning by someone overshooting the pool table is not how I like to spend my vacation, and neither is listening to loud music all day.

There are lots of better options in Kampot, avoid this place at all cost.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: My room was unfit for livingβ€
content: I was a repeat customer and had planned to stay several nights but everything was so bad I left after 1 night. There was no pleasant greeting when I arrived. Just β€what do you wantβ€.  When booking I requested a quiet room on upper level. The hotel wasnβ€™t busy so it shouldnβ€™t have been a problem. But I got 1st floor top of the stairs! Staff just to lazy to take me to a higher floor I guess. The room was utterly disgusting. Smelt terrible. Walls covered in mould. The wall was actually damp! Hole in The  bathroom ceiling where there had been a big leak. The bed had hairs in it. Not comfortable, no blanket, just a sheet. No bottled water supplied. Bathroom was filthy so I didnβ€™t even feel comfortable to shower here. In the morning I had a headache and sore eyes from this room. Yuk! Oh and please note the rooms do not have televisions.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Well located but ... β€
content: The hotel is well located but kind of dirty. They ask you to take off your shoes when you come in, but then your feet are black because the floor is so dirty. Also, we think our room wasnβ€™t cleaned before we got in. The sheet werenβ€™t changed, there were hair in there. The staff changed the sheet when we asked, but the floor was also dirty so was the bathroom. Also, some of the staff was really nice, but some was rude. Like we were disturbing them when we had a question. So if you pay 10-15$ I guess itβ€™ ok, but more than that... nope.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Gone downhillβ€
content:
The property itself needs a proper renovation, serious mold and leaks in the rooms (I stayed in the riverside and their priciest room). Water pooled in the room from rain, very bad mold in room and shower, hardly any water pressure in shower.


Something they can't be blamed for,but also don't warn you about, is there is terribly loud music along the riverside (wasn't there previously) that blares until midnight each night.

hotel_name: κµΏλ¨λ‹ μΊ„νΏ κ²μ¤νΈν•μ°μ¤ (Good Morning Kampot Guesthouse)
title: Bare minimum hotel, fine, great view thoughβ€
content:
This hotel is what I call a bare minimum hotel. You get what you pay for. A bed, table and chair, a bathroom and air-con. So it was fine for what we needed. 
What was weird was that the hotel had a great location so just a few extra things could make the hotel great. I have three particular things in mind. 
1) Finish the details. I don't know why there was a hole in the wall, and it had no influence on our quality of stay, but I did wonder why they didn't just fix that and other details. 
2) The staff was just sort of hanging around. I mean they were nice and helpfull, but not in the classical service-sense. And there were things they could have done (like wash the floor).
3) Wash the floor. Seriously, it's not just this place but Cambodia in general. It bugs me when I'm asked to take of my shoes and the floor isn't clean (specifically is was dusty like the red cambodian soil).
This may make the hotel sound bad, but that not what I mean. It is just a bare-minimum hotel.
